d:testDescription.p: Test left-to-right aspect of internationalized text.

Various text strings in various languages appear. The main purpose of the test is to verify that the correct characters appear and that they appear in the correct order and orientation, even though the first choice font does not have the right glyphs.

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required.

d:passCriteria.p: Correct rendering requires that each character is rendered. It may be rendered with the 'missing glyph' if no glyphs are found in the fonts listed in the content, or in any fallback font that is available. The first choice font is a special SVG font that only contains the 'missing glyph'. Missing glyph from other fonts may conformantly be used, however.
The test is passed if the lines of text appear as follows:

ul.li: Polish: Mogę jeść szkło, i mi ...
Yiddish: איך קען עסן גלאָז און ...
Chinese:我能吞下玻璃而不伤身体。
Japanese: 私はガラスを食べます。

g.text: Polish: Mogę jeść szkło, i mi ...
Yiddish: איך קען עסן גלאָז און ...
Chinese:我能吞下玻璃而不伤身体。
Japanese: 私はガラスを食べます。
